SEARCH
Package database

Class SuggestionDB

java.lang.Object
database.SuggestionDB
public class SuggestionDB extends Object
The SuggestionDB class represents an in-memory database for managing suggestions related to camps. It provides methods for adding, updating, and retrieving suggestions from the database. This class follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure a single instance is used throughout the application.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SuggestionDB getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the SuggestionDB class.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of SuggestionDB.

    • getSuggestion

      public Suggestion getSuggestion(String campId, String studentId)
      Retrieves a suggestion from the database based on the camp ID and student ID.
      Parameters:
      campId - The ID of the camp associated with the suggestion.
      studentId - The ID of the student who made the suggestion.
      Returns:
      The suggestion object or null if not found.

    • addSuggestion

      public void addSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)
      Adds a new suggestion to the database.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The suggestion object to be added.

    • updateSuggestion

      public void updateSuggestion(Suggestion updatedSuggestion)
      Updates an existing suggestion in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedSuggestion - The updated suggestion object.

    • removeSuggestion

      public void removeSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion)
      Removes a suggestion from the database.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The suggestion object to be removed.

    • getSuggestionsByCamp

      public List<Suggestion> getSuggestionsByCamp(String campId)
      Retrieves all suggestions associated with a specific camp from the database.
      Parameters:
      campId - The ID of the camp for which suggestions are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of suggestions for the specified camp.

    • getSuggestionsByStudent

      public List<Suggestion> getSuggestionsByStudent(String studentId)
      Retrieves all suggestions made by a specific student from the database.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student for which suggestions are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of suggestions made by the specified student.
